website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 510 v3 is a trail running shoe designed for neutral foot movement. The shoe gained positive remarks because of its durability, comfort, and reliable traction while running on varied terrains. However, most of the runners were unhappy because of the tight fitting and off sizing of the shoe.
pros: The New Balance 510 v3 was a very comfortable shoe, according to some users
Some runners mentioned that they liked the eye-catching colors and design of the shoe
More than a couple of runners made positive remarks on the shoe’s reliable grip on both wet and dry surfaces
A number of users were impressed with the shoe’s reliable cushioning
The 510 v3 was a versatile shoe
some users used it as a trail running and daily go-to shoe
The shoe’s outsole unit was durable enough for off-road running, according to a handful of users
According to a few users, the 510 v3 was a breathable shoe
cons: A number of runners mentioned that the shoe was heavy and looked bulky on their feet
The shoe was way too narrow, said some users

customer_reviews.title: I love these hiking & trail shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat wide feet & these specific NB shoes are great for trail walking & hiking. I love them. The soles are thicker so if you’re walking in a rocky type of area/ground, you don’t feel the rocks & you feel more stable walking. I have several NB shoes in my closet now because NB makes perfect fitting shoes for people with feet like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not as durable as I'd like.
customer_reviews.text: I got these the second week of February. In the first week of April, the tread started coming off. (See pictures.) They are very comfortable, look nice and I don't mind having to glue them, but for the price, it'd be nice if they didn't come apart so quickly. Maybe New Balance can fix this problem in later versions.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: very nice, slightly small
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these - I bought them to hike but they are a little small - they fit perfectly with my sports Teds socks. I had an orthopedic insoles in as well, but I only wear NB runners for work and I always buy size 8 - these are really nice, just a little small because they come with a special padded insole.
customer_reviews.author: rural girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice work shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work- I am an RN on a busy hospital unit. I ordered a half-size up from my usual size because I use the New Balance meta support insoles in my shoes which take up a little more space, and the shoes just fit. If I had purchased my regular size, they would have been too small. So far, they are working great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa_WI

customer_reviews.title: True to NB small fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have learned that NB size is different than my typical shoe size! Any other shoe I am a 7.5, NB I am a 8.5 to 9.5. I read reviews after ordering an 8.5 in this style. I thought for sure these would be too small. (My teen daughter wears a size smaller than I do so I kick all too small NB her direction!) I was pleasantly surprised, a perfect fit. I am excited about this shoe, well built and durable as always and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with my running shoes and every time I've gotten New Balance shoes they have never let me down. These are great. They feel bouncy and light, yet sturdy and have great traction over rough terrain. I've only had them for a few days now but they already are proving to be a very good investment. As someone who's suffered from chronic shin splits, it's very important that I have shoes that are able to work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/great insert
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable for walking and I have chronic sore feet. I usually have to buy an insert for my shoes but the insert for these is particularly comfortable. This is my second pair of this style. I don’t have any need for extra width and these fit me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: I was not expecting as nice of a shoe
customer_reviews.text: Actually for the price, I was not expecting as nice of a shoe. Very pleasantly surprised. I always wear an insert for high arch and there was not much arch support, but with the insert, felt great.
customer_reviews.author: lovemusic

customer_reviews.title: Fit small - order a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: These run small so I recommend going 1/2 to 1 size up. Since I had foot surgery, my doctor told me to wear a bigger shoe so I went from a size 7 1/2 to 8 1/2. I bought 8 1/2 in two different brands of sneakers and they give me plenty of room in the toe area, about 1/2 inch. I ordered 8 1/2 in these sneakers and they are too small. There is about 3/4 - 1 inch difference in these than my other two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kara D.

customer_reviews.title: Picky Shoe Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is the pickiest person with shoes, she absolutely LOVES these shoes. Having a lower arch, they don't bother her feet. She also has a wide foot and doesn't feel any squishing pressure, only support. Daddy accidentally bought 2 pairs, and she won't be returning the additional pair, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Shoes too narrow to be medium width.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many new balance shoes. But this shoe never fit correctly. They are too narrow across the toes and width of the foot. I should have sent them back but I kept trying to maybe break them in. I give up! I think the shoes were miss marked instead of medium should have been marked narrow. Or they were made wrong. I wasted my money. If you buy these shoes, if they don't fit send them back right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer B Den Berg

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality, nice and comfortable, fast delivery. But there was 1 issue concerning the color of the ordered item. We ordered shoes in blue color inside and on the bottom. But we got the good with the mixed (orange-blue) colors on the sole and orange color inside. And 1 strange thing: indicating my order, page displays the item we have got, but after clicking on it, the desired good what we ordered is appearing :) On the right 2 photo: what we have got; left: What we've ordered. I am noting again that the received good is high quality and comfortable, fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi Mumladze

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: They are very uncomfortable for running. One of them came off as I was running after 10 minutes. lol I have other pairs of New Balance they work great on me but these ones are no bueno. I just use them as school shoes 😂.
customer_reviews.author: Grenache

customer_reviews.title: They fit great if you buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: So I normally wear a size 11 shoe, but with New Balance I wear a 12. They fit great if you buy a size up, and this particular NB shoe gets me through a 16 hour shift caring for my residents
customer_reviews.author: cem

customer_reviews.title: Odd Color purple navy and as discussed in reviews I ...
customer_reviews.text: Odd Color purple navy and as discussed in reviews I read the wide new balance has issues with quality control this wide shoe was a tighter fit than a pair of regular width in the same s style. Also when you look at the right and left shoes they are shaped slightly different....these cost enough they should match.
customer_reviews.author: majic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I workout in these shoes (bike and weight lifting). Very comfortable. I’m not a runner or jumper so I can’t provide feedback for those activities.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: When I purchased this pair of trail runners, I ...
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this pair of trail runners, I ordered a size 9 for extra room. I ended up exchanging the pair for a 9D as toe box was very tight and my toes were hitting the front of the shoe. Unfortunately, purchasing a 9D did not correct the tight toe box issue and I had problems with cramping. Had to return. I hesitate ordering a 9.5 because it would be too large in other areas.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Guariglio

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were given a thumbs up by my podiatrist. Can't go wrong for the price. I am on my feet 6 to 9 hours a day, no sitting down, they have made a difference in how much foot pain I have at the end of a shift.
customer_reviews.author: DebS224

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I should of read the reviews before I ordered this shoe, It runs small, so size up.
customer_reviews.author: sharon autrey

customer_reviews.title: Crappy insole right size but really tight.
customer_reviews.text: Had to remove the insole and put in a better one, there is no room for the toes and these hurt my feet after a few hours. They need some serious breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: shawna R Gelnett

customer_reviews.title: A 7 is smaller than a 6.5?  No joy
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great except the sizing is a joke. I wear a 6.5 b in Nike. First ordered that, slightly small. Ordered a 7d, couldn't even attempt to walk they hurt so bad.
customer_reviews.author: sandangel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I only buy new balance shoes, I'm a size 10 and have always had good luck with their shoes
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and on my feet all day. I average 5 miles per shift and they are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen  Levering

customer_reviews.title: The site recommended a 9 but it was small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. The site recommended a 9 but it was small. Returned them. Will try later to find a size that fits.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great support, Great price, Great Shoe..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were recommended by my daughters orthopedic Dr. because she has a bad knee. Since she has been wearing them she said the pain is a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: La'Voncye

customer_reviews.title: Good thing or I'd have been sending them back
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews so instead of an 8 1/2, I ordered a 9 1/2. Good thing or I'd have been sending them back. Were pretty stiff at first but once I had them in awhile they felt pretty darn good. AND a great price. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Great Support!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! These are my favorite NB style and help support my high arches without irritating my Plantar Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great fit from New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I need a trail shoe for traction when walking and this shoe is a perfect fit. I am a big fan of New Balance for women and will continue to order from Amazon for that reason. Price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: stiller gym rat

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice but a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice but a bit tight, not true to size. Maybe I still need to break them in. For the price can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: ismael

customer_reviews.title: New Balance makes great products
customer_reviews.text: Good cushioning - good stability. A little clunky for track running - but great for trail running.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My day shoe when sightseeing
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for sightseeing. Love the thick sole, cushioning, overall comfort . These accommodate my orthotics well. When I am walking or standing a lot, I have no fatigue in my feet or legs. Also good on uneven surfaces like cobblestones.
customer_reviews.author: Merle B.

customer_reviews.title: wide heel, tight toe box
customer_reviews.text: still tight around the toes. other than that, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A so-so daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: As an occasional wear shoe these aren't bad, but I'll have to replace the insoles with something more cushioning if I want them as a daily. They're nice looking, so I hope to get more use out of them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Constance and Greg

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, very comfortable. They do run a little small. I've been wearing a 6.5 in New Balance shoes for years, but in this particular shoe I would be more comfortable in a 7.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I need to walk around the apartment 1st to make sure it fit well. I have problems with my feet and I'm hoping that these shoes will work for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style. The cushion insole makes me forget I have them on.
customer_reviews.author: llg

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed because they are super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are 1size smaller fit than I normally wear. Really disappointed because they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: aqha01

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that runs small. I wore New Balance many years ago. Shoe is a great quality but the size is wrong. I returned the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 shoe; after reading reviews and before purchasing, I ordered 8.5. However, they are too small. I am shipping them back to Amazon. I should have ordered size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Conservative

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too short for my right foot!
customer_reviews.text: May need the next size up. I will buy it and keep the one that feels best and return the other.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: well made, attractive shoes, but had to return them. almost a full size too small.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! So comfortable and supportive - use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! So comfortable and supportive - use them for working out and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Missy R

customer_reviews.title: Not too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I typically order a wide and just got a 6.5 regular. Fits great. Love them so far.

customer_reviews.title: Runs one whole size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9, buy a 9.5.in tennis shoes. I should have ordered a size 10.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Order a half size larger and consider the D width unless you have an unusually narrow foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. They are very comfortable. I only take off them when I go to bed or take shower.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These were so small, after wearing them once I gave them away.

customer_reviews.title: the person says the shoes are great, they fit good
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift, the person says the shoes are great, they fit good..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent shoes, fit as it should and love the color and design

customer_reviews.text: Bought on sale and not sure if I was going to like them. Ended up loving them.

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8/12. These were too small. Sent them back

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I sent the first ones back and ordered a 1/2 size bigger. These are much better!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. She sits well on her leg. Beautiful with delicate colors. very pleased.!

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: They run a half size smaller than my old ones. I tried my regular size 7.5, but returned them and ordeted the size 8. Perfect! Love the color!

customer_reviews.title: ... little larger than my own size but it's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little larger than my own size but it's a good product.

customer_reviews.title: Nice walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for when I don't need a hiking boot.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, very light weight. But runs very small. Sent back.

customer_reviews.title: decent for $15.00!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfortable as far as the sole padding goes. Bit too small in sizing though.

customer_reviews.title: It is small size or factory made miss size I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is small size or factory made miss size I am pleasant to made shipped made time on delivery by schedule date

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for running on a trail. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... said this show ran small but they fit exactly like a pair of new balance all terrain shoes I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews said this show ran small but they fit exactly like a pair of new balance all terrain shoes I've had for years (except not broken in). Still room for my orthotic insert!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Landress

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Love the rich color. New balance fit me better than any other brand.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them but to small keeping them because not on sale anymore
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Kemp

customer_reviews.title: be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought the wide with and they are way too narrow. Disappointing, as I've never had this issue with New Balance sneakers before.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, did not need a "break in" period. Love the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dee Nasca

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have proven to be extremely comfortable and supportive of my wife's feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have proven to be extremely comfortable and supportive of my wife's feet. She goes on and on about how comfortable they are, instead of complaining about sore feet. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Layton Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed with the size
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with the size. I've always got 11s & they were just too small. So happy to fine a 12 in some I like but they were not much bigger than the 11. I put the insole of the 12 in my 11 shoes & they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in them for a day and now they feel fine. A little snug when I first put them ...
customer_reviews.text: Walked in them for a day and now they feel fine. A little snug when I first put them on. Brought another pair because it's hard finding all black tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but run small.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and quality trail shoes. My only hiccup was how small they run. I typically wear a size 8 1/2 shoe, but had to go up to 9 1/2 on these! Thankful for prime free returns! Other than the size issue, these are great shoes so far!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Match your jeans
customer_reviews.text: Fit well - these shoes are both comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: I have the same "model" and size in an older ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the same "model" and size in an older version and this one has less fabric in the toe area. Get wider than you normally need.
customer_reviews.author: L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have bought 3 of the same pairs in different colors. They have great cuision and breath well. Love em!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The comfort
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and style. But these shows comes small. I love amazon I gust signed in so far so good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Margie C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes and so comfortable! They do run small, so order a size larger. I normally wear a 9.5, so I ordered a 10.5 and they fit perfect. Also, I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are a little tight across my toes. I do have wide feet though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Asher/James

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but are much smaller than they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Size Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made shoe but they do run small so if you wear a size 8 I would recommend you get a 8 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: They are exactly what I was expecting and they are very comfortable. Would highly recommend this shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering any shoes from Amazon and I was very impressed. They are exactly what I was expecting and they are very comfortable. Would highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rossick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the color but they are too narrow for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the color but they are too narrow for my feet. I would return them but I've worn them for probably 12+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Richard

customer_reviews.title: I did like the style
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet. The shoes were too generous in width and shorter than expected even when I ordered the next size up. I did like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable. My question is why does the right show is tighter?
customer_reviews.author: ARod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: New Balance shoes are the best for people with feet or back problems. These shoes are great!
customer_reviews.author: MARY KAY

customer_reviews.title: Loved your old New Balance? Don't buy newer ones!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of old New Balance that were fantastic! I had to go a full size up on these and after using them for awhile, they've torn up my feet horribly. I have three different blisters constantly no matter what I try in order to fix it. I hate these and I will never buy New Balance again. They're smaller, cheaply made, narrower, and uncomfortable. I wish I never bought them.
customer_reviews.author: RainMama

customer_reviews.title: As recommended by other reviews I ordered a 1/2 size up ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit quite differently than my other NB trail shoes. As recommended by other reviews I ordered a 1/2 size up and that worked well. The toe shape is broader than other NB sneakers. The heel area also seems wider which I do not like as my heel slips a bit. I am no expert but the tred on the bottom of the shoe looks more useful for street walking than trail use. The color and overall appearance are good. The shoes were priced significantly lower than my other trail shoes. They will be fine for kicking around the house and town.
customer_reviews.author: orinda_ca

customer_reviews.title: Love my New Balance Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, fit perfectly, and the dark color is great for hiding dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable shoe. I'm on my feet all day and my feet don't hurt as much by the time I get home after wearing these. I've always had issues with finding a good Comfortable shoe for work. So far I've been wearing these for about a week and so far so good. I did go a half size bigger then usual and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: not a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: would love to return this shoe but window is up and shoe is not what was expected
customer_reviews.author: Mother Goose

customer_reviews.title: the material inside under the shoe laces and around toes ...
customer_reviews.text: the material inside under the shoe laces and around toes is a little rough and hard. The overall shoe structure is stiff and bulky. I'll stay with my Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: IF

customer_reviews.title: Not as much cushioning in the heel as I would like but a good deal for the
customer_reviews.text: These are cute shoes. I usually wear a 9 1/2 or 10 and definitely had to go with a 10 on these. Not as much cushioning in the heel as I would like but a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Klemetson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered a half size larger than I have in the past of this same shoe and style based on other reviews. I'm very disappointed and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: THE SHOE FIT A BIT SMALL SO I RETURNED IT ...
customer_reviews.text: THE SHOE FIT A BIT SMALL SO I RETURNED IT FOR SIZE 9 ABOUT 3 WEEEKS AGO BUT HAVE NOT HEARD FROM THEM OR RECEIVED THE SIZE NINE SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: lolita hazel

customer_reviews.title: I went up jalf a size and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I went up jalf a size and glad I did. They are now a little wider than I am used to, but comfy
customer_reviews.author: T. Myers

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Wt510v3 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Supportive, durable, rugged and comfortable, the trail 510v3 is the perfect utility product. The structural upper, molded heel counter and ALL TERRAIN tread provide superior durability while the breathable mesh and ultra soft comfort insert provide all day comfort for whatever comes your way.
